meanings.definition: A North American shrub or small tree with aromatic leaves and berries.
meanings.sent1: The spicebush in our garden has leaves that smell really nice.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the spicebush in science class.
meanings.sent3: The spicebush whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a spicebush, full of fragrant memories.
meanings.sent5: The spicebush stood out in the forest with its aromatic scent.

meanings.definition: The dried berries or leaves of the spicebush plant, used as a seasoning in cooking.
meanings.sent1: Mom added some spicebush to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a pinch of spicebush to enhance the taste.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the spicebush all over the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the spicebush filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The spicebush added a burst of flavor to the dish, making it irresistible.
